groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Newsly

attrs.label: Python Logging
attrs.description: This will make so the python logs considered as usual logs

attrs.label: Script Interval
attrs.description: How often data will be taken from the iDrac host

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Newsly.

attrs.label: iDrac Host
attrs.description: Hostname or IP address of the database server.

attrs.label: iDrac Username
attrs.description: Username that will be used to communicate with iDrac

attrs.label: iDrac Password
attrs.description: Password for the user that will be used to communicate with iDrac.

attrs.label: Python Logging
attrs.description: This will make so the python logs considered as usual logs

attrs.label: MQTT Host
attrs.description: Hostname or IP address of the MQTT server.

attrs.label: MQTT Username
attrs.description: Username that will be used to communicate with MQTT

attrs.label: MQTT Password
attrs.description: Password for the user that will be used to communicate with MQTT.

attrs.label: MQTT Topic
attrs.description: MQTT Topic to which will be published

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Newsly will run as.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Newsly will run as.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Newsly.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Newsly.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

runAsContext.description: Newsly can run as any non-root user.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Newsly

attrs.label: Python Logging
attrs.description: This will make so the python logs considered as usual logs

attrs.label: Script Interval
attrs.description: How often data will be taken from the iDrac host

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Newsly.

attrs.label: iDrac Host
attrs.description: Hostname or IP address of the database server.

attrs.label: iDrac Username
attrs.description: Username that will be used to communicate with iDrac

attrs.label: iDrac Password
attrs.description: Password for the user that will be used to communicate with iDrac.

attrs.label: Python Logging
attrs.description: This will make so the python logs considered as usual logs

attrs.label: MQTT Host
attrs.description: Hostname or IP address of the MQTT server.

attrs.label: MQTT Username
attrs.description: Username that will be used to communicate with MQTT

attrs.label: MQTT Password
attrs.description: Password for the user that will be used to communicate with MQTT.

attrs.label: MQTT Topic
attrs.description: MQTT Topic to which will be published

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Newsly will run as.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Newsly will run as.

attrs.label: Web Port
attrs.description: The port for the Newsly Web UI.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.</br>

attrs.label: Newsly Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Newsly Configuration.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: Additional Storage
attrs.description: Additional storage for Newsly.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Share
attrs.description: The share name for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain (Optional)
attrs.description: The domain for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Newsly.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Newsly.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

runAsContext.description: Newsly can run as any non-root user.
